column8: · The system fails to normalize the currency symbol from “Rs.” to the expected Sinhala representation “රු.”.

· Email addresses are technical identifiers and should remain unchanged during conversion.
· Altering the email username makes the address invalid and unusable.

· The system incorrectly transliterates parts of the URL into Sinhala characters.
· Modifying protocol names and domain text makes the URL invalid and unusable.
· The system introduces incorrect mixed characters while converting the sentence.
· Sinhala characters are incorrectly combined with English letters, resulting in corrupted words.
· This affects readability and fails to preserve the original sentence meaning accurately.
· The system fails to correctly normalize excessive character repetition used for emphasis.
· Repeated vowels in the input cause additional unwanted characters to appear in the output.
· This results in a grammatically incorrect and less readable converted sentence.

· As a result, incorrect and malformed Sinhala characters are generated in the output.
· This causes loss of readability and incorrect sentence formation.
